experiences.title: UX Designer
desc: Collaborated with team to optimize workflow and achieve objectives.
Monitored emerging UX design trends and practices for useful techniques and cutting-edge developments suitable for integration into future projects.
Analyzed user feedback to influence future UX updates, ameliorating user concerns and pain points during subsequent patch cycles.
Applied both qualitative and quantitative analysis techniques to continuously improve end-user experiences.

experiences.title: Volunteer
desc: Volunteered with groups and organizations to help make increased measurable differences for program recipients.
Engaged in about 5 community outreaches to support program mission.
Exhibited excellent communications and customer service relations skills.
Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote lifelong learning opportunities for all

projects.title: Movie Discovery web-app
projects.desc: A movie discovery app where users can search for their favourite and trending movies including TV series.

projects.title: Image Gallery
projects.desc: A sortable image gallery where user can arrange their images to their liking .
